name: d3-labels
description: Place labels with d3js on maps and other vizualisations

scripts.pretest: npm run build && npm run build-test
scripts.test: tape 'test/*-test.js' && mkdir -p test/output && eslint index.js src
scripts.build: rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g d3-dispatch:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-labels.js -- index.js
